pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost Calm & De-Stress 60 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Calm + De-Stress is a premium quality formula containing magnesium, ashwagandha, passionflower and reishi mushroom.

Mild Anxiety Symptom Relief: Passionflower is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help relieve symptoms of mild anxiety and as a calmative to relax the nervous system.

Healthy Stress Response: Ashwagandha is traditionally used in Ayurvedic medicine as an adaptogen to help the body adapt to stress. Magnesium supports a healthy stress response in the body.

Nervous System Health: Magnesium maintains nervous system health.

Fatigue Relief: Reishi mushroom is traditionally used in Chinese medicine to help relieve fatigue.

Size: 60 Pack

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Ingredients

Each Film Coated Tablet Contains: Magnesium (from magnesium citrate) 52.5 mg, Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera extract 30 mg) equiv. dry root
[standardised to contain withanolides (of withania somnifera) 1.5 mg] 1.5 g (min.), Passionflower (Passiflora incarnata extract 60 mg) equiv. dry herb 3g, Reishi Mushroom (Ganoderma lucidum extract 50 mg) equiv. dry fruiting body 1g.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE: Two tablets daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE: Two tablets daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place.
